summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates Qiskit's preset transpilation pipelines, checking final and initial qubit layouts, optimization level selection, handling of controlâ€‘flow constructs, pass inspection across different backends and coupling maps, and correct preservation of swap gates when part of the basis set.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the preset pass manager API so that developers and users can rely on automatic transpilation to produce accurate, optimized circuits under diverse hardware and configuration scenarios.
